reviewText:
I stoped playing the game when I shot a small basket and the bullet rebounded and hit me in the head killing me.

This was after around 2 hours of playing I had a good feel for the game,I knew how to craft how to shoot and what the game had to offer.
I highly doupt anyone has ever played this game to the end because it is much harder then dark souls,It puts take down red saber to shame.

Not because the game is really that hard you have 5 ways to attack all work fine.

1.Is you stick machte thing:You get this right away, it lets you swing and block is good when you are fighting the monkys.
2.The magic wristband thingy:This is like some sort of big blast that can take out any enemy in one shot but you can only rechagre it at these stone things but this one time I used it died then when I reloaded my save I was still out of ammo even though the save was before I shot it,so great is breaks the game to.
3.The handgun: This thing allways acts like its hitting mettal even on peoples heads,other then that its a probly the best way to kill anything because its 2 shots vs the natvies and lets you shoot one shot after another.
4.The double barrle shot gun pistol thing:This is the weakest ranged wepon and allways acts like your are hitting someone and making them bleed,even if you are shooting a rock,so it gives rocks blood great.
5.Blowgun: I guess this is for stealth I never got to use it much but Its if you want to sneak.

So ya you can handdle anything they though at you if you use anyone of these,no the game is hard because its just boring.
Runing around the woods can get anoying because it all looks the same,and this is because you dont have a map,the game trys to tell you where to go with signs but they are hardly going to make it any better.

If you play this game you will break,this game is one of a kind and can be marked up there with ride to hell retrubution.
That being said I had more fun with this then ride to hell,because that game was so long and boring that it took far to long to get to some of the funny stuff later on.
But this game thoughs evrey funny thing that can happen right away, if you alt tab at any time you go to limbo land,there is no sounds when the temple at the start of the game explodes,there is plenty of random and funny stuff that you can do in this game.


So yes I totaly recommend this game if you want a good laugh,I feel bad for the people made this game,he just wanted people to like his game,he just wanted to be notcied,he even payed people who could survive in the game for several days in the games survival mode.

This game just had bad luck around the time it came out and really does not desrve the hate it gets when games.Games like ride to hell are just called *jokes*, despite the fact that ride to hell can be offensive,this game is just buggy.

But thats the thing you wont last long in this game it will  break you,but if you can get this game for less then 5 bucks (hopefully like 2$ bucks like I did) then its a good deal.

Its more fun then call of duty,its more funny then goat simulator,its more garry then garrys mod.

If you like games like warz,goat simulator,ride to hell,two worlds,sonic 06,elder scrolls 4 oblivion,and other such so bad they are good games,then you owe your self to check this one out!


(This review as said above is before I beat the game,so I will update the game when I get around to beating it)

reviewText:
I love games; simply said. i needed to play 5 min just to write the review but so far have played a couple hours. Its not as bad as the reviews put out. Game only crashed once, and i got stuck under the rocks at the very beginning after i picked up the arm weapon because i did not move right away, and i did not die. but so far quite smooth. hopefully it was just a hiccup.
I will complete garry's incident, i just got it despite all those terrible reviews and will give a detailed truth be told opinion of this game from an old school gamer. Downloading now.......
i have been playing video games since calecovision and atari 2600, my first computer was a tandy, took 10 hours to program hangman to play for 5 min.
And now... On my 360, have been and was the all time gears of war #1 ranked in all ranked matches for 3 years solid. Hope my review helps.

ok So far, I have journeyed into the wilderness into some unknown amazon, with crazy lil monkeys and panthers that race out of no where at you. Paint faced tribunal men that look like cannibals, and the freindly villiage people. Garrys Incident is not that bad, I am still going to finish this game, may take me a while as i play mulitiple games, but i will.
So far its not bad. I am not sure where the developer was going with this as it is like other games, just an amateur version.
Its a wonder that unreal engine is not being used to its fullest potential as i know from personal experience that unreal engine is sleek, with very fast elements for certain games, like Unreal tournament.
I could say this would be a great first timer game getting into these types of games i guess as it seems quite hard, But to support a developer for 2 bucks is ok by me, so essentially i just bought a coffee.
So far the game is actually quite hard, the crazy cannibals keep freaking me out i tried to sneak up on one but i can not seem to sneak attack, as soon as he knows your there its game on, its like the dude has just gone on insane mode, the reviews about garry's incident should be re-evaluated as i am not sure if people just have a hate on for the developer or not but i am sure these people are hatin cause they die, just like i have been, So if you think your getting ripped off, really your not as i have seen poopier games cost way more, when you think of the time, budget allowed, coding, animations, how many are working on it plus the payout of developers time really when you think about it, its change that he is making in the end of all the costs, If you enjoy games and story lines then i am 80% sure you will see what i see. But for overall grafic's its ok, but not great. i play on the highest settings but still does not really affect the game that much other than clear everything up but still pixels. I hope the devs really appreciate my review, I am quite a critic in life and can not say its as bad as everyone is saying, it just needs a little TLC and maybe some good freinds for moral support. You have a great engine to use there dev, so please use it. I am sure you did not get your education to be ridiculed over a game, personally i got this game because of all the bad reviews, it was almost forcing me to buy it as i wanted to make sure a hidden gem was not being disgruntled for no reason, It may not be a diamond, but it does shine, just needs some polish, plus you devs should also have youtube videos to support this game. I honestly could give donation coding to you if you like as i also used to do this for a hobby, and would even sign a waiver that you have all rights to the coding i give ya, i know legals and do not mind helping out behind the lines with no need for credit in any way other than the fact i could tell my grandkids about it. just not professionally but could have as i did get an interview with epic in toronto years ago when i applied through my xbox360, had no where to live after i got there, plus knew no one so i did not bother, i just kept on lobster fishing and working for a domain name provider.  I did catch the bottle of jack daniels at the beginning clearly labled as it used to be my favorite drink. So cheers, lets make some boiler makers... or apple jacks
If you do not know what a boiler maker is ill tell ya...

2 Oz of jack daniels
1 Bottle of beer.
1 large enough glass to hold all of the beer and the shot glass.
Fill glass with cold beer.
ready yourself...
drop the shot in the glass of beer.
as soon as you see the shot glass is on the bottom, takes 1 sec
chug your glass as fast as you can to empty.....

apple jacks

your favorite ice cold apple juice or cider
mix with jack #7 to taste mmmm

let me know how many you could handle if you try it....

I don't give a ♥♥♥♥ about other people's opinion to cloud my own opinion, I wanted to know it for myself if this game is ♥♥♥♥♥♥ or not. And for a price where you buy a hamburger for which is done in a few minutes, I wanted to see and experience this game myself.

The title screen was promising, I thought it was a zombie survival game, put when the gameplay started I was surprised. Nevertheless, I gave it shot. There were some rage moments (thus challenges to overcome), the puzzles were easy but some of them are almost impossible because of hitboxes that it made me almost quit the game entirely. But I kept playing it. The game evolved into a strange put urgent situation that I had to finish it, I don't know why.

Took me 4.3 hours, most of the time is at that spot where the hitboxes are ♥♥♥♥ed up and another level which was surprisingly extremely fun. I once got stuck at a certain point where I had to restart the game 10 times but eventually finished it and I must say that the game has potention but it's not quite visible. And 30% of it was extremely entertaining.

Do I recommend it? Yes and no, but I do wait for the next episode!!! Can't wait! Developers? Don't see those bad reviews as a sign to stop making the next episode, learn from them instead. I am sure, the second episode will be a blast!
But the game is playable to the end and it can entertain you for a few hours, in comparisation with the money you pay for it.

I understand why people hate this game, don't be spoiled, the game has potention but is a bit worked out poorly. But it also has a lot of details, a lot of unneeded details in fact, but still. I had, unlike the complications it sometimes had, fun. YES! I HAD FUN!!! So there you have it, take it or leave it. Every person is different and you might be one of them, that appreciates a game like this.

reviewText:
I feel like this game gets a bad rap. It really doesn't deserve all the hate. Here's a run down of the game and may I tell you now it can have a few spoilers so be warned.

Day One: Garry's Incident takes place on a beautiful, luscious, eye candy of an island with amazing visuals and sound design that you really feel like you are in the world. You play as a character respectfully known as Garry. (I personally think he is a hunk, I would bury my face in that teddy bear beard of his and never let go of him. Garry is my true lord and savior and I would give up everything to be with him forever). Now, you crash land on an island after a giant anomaly hits Garry's plane, but miraculously he survives, and is taken in by a group of very nice tribal men who offer him tea and buiscets for the small small price of his squishy anal virginity. He refuses and they strap him down, man handling him like never before and they take him on a true ride. Now here is a big spoiler, the tribal men who are pretty hunky themselves have some fairly large horse ♥♥♥♥♥ which they release upon Garry, but he manages to break free from his restraints and take down what used to be the nicest men he had ever met. (They had sweet smiles that may have been semi-erotic but we will never know because Garry killed the ♥♥♥♥ out of them. And possibly had his way with them. Necrophelia is a huge fetish of mine.) This is where Garry escapes the tomb he had been soccumbed into, and he embarks on a journey to find true love, adventure, and hard liqour.

Thank you for reading my review! I put a lot of time and effort in both the game and this review and I hope you enjoy Day One: Garry's Incident as much as I did! Oh! And before I forget, the game runs at a beautiful and constant 130 Frames, and never drops. It works surprisingly well. And the enemy AI is extremely smart. Seeking you out, and throwing grenades in mass in whichever trench or fox hole you wind up in. Reminds me of the good ol' World At War days. Except they throw fart bombs. More deadly. More silent. Anyways...
I rate this game a 9 out of 10, the only thing lacking is the amount of playtime that you can put in without there being music, I heard the game has a massive beautiful sound track conducted by Hans Zimmer, the guy who did the MW2 soundtrack (Which I love so much!) but I guess theres a bug. But I trust these dev's will hammer out that little minor bug and get the sexy tunes rolling into my ears soon enough. Well, until next time!

reviewText:
I think this game receives too much flak, people bandwagoning on a hate train created by popular Youtubers. Sure, it is not perfect, but nothing truly is. I see this to be like another Bubsy 3D, a gem that is simply thrown into the trash by people with unrealistic standards. Not everyone can create a Triple A budget title, and have to make do with the tools available to them. And in this regard, I see Day One: Garry's Incident as a rather fine title. If I were to change only one thing, it would be  to have multiple areas which would load separately, so not to stress the system too much. This simple fix could turn this B- game into an A for me.

Don't fall victim to this blackhole of negativity. This is hardly one of the worst games ever, like so many claim. I mean, if it were that bad, it'd have been taken Steam by now, like so many other titles. Such as Ride to Hell and War Z.

To conclude my report, this game is a fine deal for the low price it is at. Just do not expect it to be on par with something like the Nathan Drake series, which I feel this is very comparable to in terms of setting, themes, and characters.

Thank you for reading, and I hope anyone who decides to purchase this title will see the positives to it. Such as a nice variety of weapons, a crafting system, and survival mode which I feel surpasses that of Rust, Garry's other project.
